abilities.name: Frost Armour
abilities.details: Fenrir generates a layer of frost over his fur every now and then. This armour grants him a [ar]flat damage reduction[/] against [ar]basic attacks[/] and minor [mr]magical resistance[/].[n]When Fenrir is hit by 3 basic attacks or 1 displacement effect by an enemy hero, it shatters, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to nearby enemies and applying 3 stacks of Frost.[n]Enemies with Frost have their [db]movement speed[/] reduced, stacking up to 8 times.

abilities.name: Glacial Slash
abilities.details: Fenrir slashes his claws in front of him, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/] and [ap]magical power[/]) and applying 2 stacks of Frost on the target.[n]If the target has 5 or more stacks, this ability [bf]heals[/] Fenrir for a portion of his missing health.[n]If the target has 8 stacks, this ability deals additional [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/] and target's [db]maximum health[/]).

abilities.name: Boreal Breath
abilities.details: Fenrir exhales a blast of freezing wind in a cone for a short duration.[n]Enemies caught in the breath take [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) every half of second and have their [db]attack speed[/] reduced.[n]Each tick of damage also applies 1 stack of Frost (up to 3 stacks per ability's full duration).

abilities.name: Snow Ball
abilities.details: Fenrir conjures a snowball that rolls in a target direction. As it travels, it grows in size, increasing its damage and impact radius.[n]Upon contact with an enemy hero, it explodes, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/] and [ap]magical power[/]) and [db]knocking up[/] enemies hit.

abilities.name: Winter Is Coming
abilities.details: Fenrir lets out a blood-curdling howl, causing a localised blizzard to swirl around him for a duration, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) and applying 1 stack of Frost per tick of damage (up to 8 stacks per ability's full duration).[n]In addition, he gains increased [bf]size[/], [bf]attack range[/] and his Frost Armour cannot be shattered (if Fenrir does not currently have Frost Armour, using this ability instantly grants him the armour).
